name: Cake Princess
description:
Bugs & Feedback to esdreika@outlook.com

Linux Build isn't tested yet.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Roll around and help the princess!

Gather food and watch her getting fatter as you roll towards the end of the level.

Fun prototype we made for the Jam with both themes with Loco Roco like Gameplay we made for the Ludum Dare 34 Jam!

Rate here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Press Left/Right or LB/RB on Xbox Gamepad to tilt the screen.

Start/Space starts the game on the title screen.

Back closes the game on any screen.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music by:

Will Do – Jon Björk

Children Playground 8 – Anders Ekengren

Made by:

Armin "Esdreika" Theisz - Programming/Gamedesign

Mister K. - Programming

Nana "Olaph" Balder - Art

Chris "aski" Gussner - Leveldesign
